snippet: Justin Gatlin stretched his season’s unbeaten streak in the 100 meters to 10 races by setting a Gugl Games record in Linz, Austria.
abstract: American sprinter Justin Gatlin stretches his season’s unbeaten streak in the 100 meters to 10 races by setting a Gugl Games record in Linz, Austria, finishing in 9.82 seconds.
lead_paragraph: Justin Gatlin stretched his season’s unbeaten streak in the 100 meters to 10 races by setting a Gugl Games record in Linz, Austria.
